io.dropwizard.logging

Interface AppenderFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Discoverable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAppenderFactory, ConsoleAppenderFactory, FileAppenderFactory, SyslogAppenderFactory

    public interface AppenderFactory
extends Discoverable
    A service provider interface for creating Logback Appender instances.

    To create your own, just:

    1. Create a class which implements AppenderFactory.
    2. Annotate it with @JsonTypeName and give it a unique type name.
    3. add a META-INF/services/io.dropwizard.logging.AppenderFactory file with your implementation's full class name to the class path.
    See Also:
    ConsoleAppenderFactory, FileAppenderFactory, SyslogAppenderFactory
